hero.intro: Technical sales professional with solid experience in sales, construction, and business management. Passionate about AI, digital, and entrepreneurship.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about innovation and entrepreneurship
about.description: With solid training in construction and diverse experience in sales and business management, I combine technical expertise with entrepreneurial vision. My passion for AI and digital drives me to create innovative solutions for businesses.
about.description_long:
After 7 years in construction, I decided to change direction. I started with sales, in permanent employment, where I honed my commercial skills in the field. In parallel, I launched my first entrepreneurial projects.

This dual experience â€” employee and entrepreneur â€” taught me to sell, manage, structurer... and above all to adapt.

Today, I combine this rigor with my passion for digital and AI to create concrete and innovative solutions. My ambition: transform ideas into growth drivers and build the companies of tomorrow.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your projects
